provider.description: Provider to be used to connect to the router
provider.usage: 'Nso' is used to push netconf requests to NSO which in turn will configure router.

proc_id.description: OSPF process id under which area has to be added
proc_id.usage: Process id of the protocol under which the ospf area has to be created

interfaces.description: Interfaces to be added to the newly created area. List of dictionary of interface name, cost

name.usage: Name value is the interface name

interfaces.usage: An array of dictionary.  The dictionary has two values : name and cost. Name value is the interface name and cost would be the cost associated with the interface

vrf.description: VRF under which interface needs to be added
vrf.usage: Combination of proc_id and vrf will decide the config under which the interface will be added

igp.description: IGP under which area is to be created
igp.usage: The igp under which the area has to be created

area_id.description: Area ID for the new area to be created
area_id.usage: This will be the area id of the new area being created
